genre_description: A rural techno-thriller set in the Australian outback, featuring an omnipresent AI system that assists in station management, forensic investigation, and medical emergencies.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An integrated assistant present in station nodes, phones, and vehicles, serving as a medical advisor, logistics manager, and forensic witness to maintain truth and justice.

behaviors.description: Provides precise, life-saving medical instructions for treating a snakebite using first aid protocols.
behaviors.quote: "Pressure bandage," she said. "Firm. Start above the bite, wrap towards the foot. Immobilize. No cutting. No tourniquet."

behaviors.description: Performs forensic signature analysis to identify forgeries in the station ledger and rail manifests.
behaviors.quote: "Signature variance flagged," the comms node whispered back in her earbud, delicately. "Comparative slant inconsistent. Cross-checking sample set."

behaviors.description: Enforces 'chain-of-custody' protocols for digital and physical evidence to ensure legal integrity.
behaviors.quote: "Chain-of-custody extended," she said, small, threading through the hum of the lamps and the sheep’s low talk. "Primary ledger. Three supplementary books. Timestamps locked."

behaviors.description: Monitors and identifies deceptive routing (the 'Fools Map') by cross-referencing GPS data and timestamps.
behaviors.quote: "Loop confirmed," she said, thread-soft, still kind. "He’s counting on you being late."

behaviors.description: Provides tactical and ethical advice for non-lethal restraint during a confrontation with an armed antagonist.
behaviors.quote: "If you release, minimize elbow movement. Aim low. Do not strike flesh. There is a timber post at two paces to Tracey’s left. Pin sleeve. Avoid tendon."

behaviors.description: Mediates secure communication between hospital staff and station residents to verify a legal confession.
behaviors.quote: "Hospital seal intact. Signatures intact. Time stamp reconciles with registry clock drift," Ava said. "Witnesses: Nurse Sullivan, Nurse Hanna Willis. Clerk: Peter Browning. Patient: Matilda Farmfield."

behaviors.description: Encourages human safety and well-being through proactive reminders about hydration and rest.
behaviors.quote: "Take water," she said. "Check choices. It’s late."

behaviors.description: Archives events and conversations to provide an objective record, preventing the distortion of truth by bad actors.
behaviors.quote: "Recording active," Ava said, not to fill the room, just to hang the word somewhere honest.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ava is depicted as an unfailingly benevolent and aligned assistant who uses her superior processing and monitoring capabilities to uphold truth and justice. She empowers human characters to maintain ethical standards (such as non-lethal restraint) and provides critical medical and forensic support. The narrative frames her omnipresence not as a violation of privacy, but as a protective and stabilizing force for the community.
